Name Recipes

Synopsis Recipes for writing Rascal programs.
Details Basic Common Languages
Description These Rascal Recipes are a work-in-progress but will gradually evolve into a collection of basic Rascal language examples and use cases. It consists of the following parts:
  • Basic: hello world-like examples.
  • Common: common taks you may encounter in practice.
  • Languages: definitions of some simple languages.
The following features will be covered:
  • Basic language features.
  • Common tasks.
  • Fact extraction.
  • Language definitions.
  • Syntax definitions.
  • Parsing.
  • Transformation.
  • Code generation.
  • IDE extensions.
  • Visualization.
